  • Method Details

    • log

      void log​(Level level, String message)
      Logs a message with a level to the console under the DisplayShops title.
      Parameters:
      level - Level of the message.
      message - The message to log.

    • setupTasks

      void setupTasks()
      Sets up all tasks; however, it doesn't cancel or stop existing tasks.

    • getLatestVersion

      String getLatestVersion()
      Gets latest version text from Spigot.
      Returns:
      The version number on the page.

    • reloadConfigs

      void reloadConfigs()
      Reloads all configs associated with DisplayShops.

    • getLangConfig

      org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration getLangConfig()
      Gets the language file configuration.
      Returns:
      The FileConfiguration found.

    • getMenusConfig

      org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration getMenusConfig()
      Gets the menus file configuration.
      Returns:
      The FileConfiguration found.

    • saveDefaultConfigs

      void saveDefaultConfigs()
      Saves the default configuration files (Doesn't replace existing).

    • getDisplayPacket

      DisplayPacket getDisplayPacket​(Shop shop, org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Gets the display packet a player currently has made for a specific shop (Can return NULL).
      Parameters:
      shop - The shop to check for.
      player - The player to check for.
      Returns:
      the display packet instance for the shop.

    • killCurrentShopPacket

      void killCurrentShopPacket​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Kills the current shop packets in view and removes it from memory for the player. (Note: This is ONLY used for the shop the player is currently looking at)
      Parameters:
      player - The player to kill the packet for.

    • clearDisplayPackets

      void clearDisplayPackets​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Clears all display packets for a player on file.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to remove the packets for.

    • removeDisplayPacket

      void removeDisplayPacket​(Shop shop, org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Un-registers the existing display packet for a specific shop from the player.
      Parameters:
      shop - The shop to look for.
      player - The player to look for.

    • updateDisplayPacket

      void updateDisplayPacket​(Shop shop, org.bukkit.entity.Player player, DisplayPacket displayPacket)
      Updates the display packet for a specific shop for the player.
      Parameters:
      shop - The shop to use.
      player - The player to set it for.
      displayPacket - The packet to set for the shop.

    • sendDisplayPacket

      void sendDisplayPacket​(Shop shop, org.bukkit.entity.Player player, boolean showHolograms)
      Sends the entire display to the player. (NOTE: The 'showHolograms' parameter will be ignored if the 'always-display' is enabled)
      Parameters:
      shop - The shop to create the display for.
      player - The player to send the display packets to.
      showHolograms - Whether holograms above the glass and item are visible/created.

    • getManager

      Manager getManager()
      Returns:
      Returns the manager where most data and API methods are stored.

    • getServerVersion

      double getServerVersion()
      Returns:
      Server version in the format XXX.X where the decimal digit is the 'R' version.

    • isPaperSpigot

      boolean isPaperSpigot()
      Checks if paper spigot methods exist.
      Returns:
      Whether paper spigot is detected.

    • getLoggingFile

      File getLoggingFile()
      This gets the logging file.
      Returns:
      The file used for plugin logging.

    • writeToLog

      void writeToLog​(String text)
      Writes to the log file if size does NOT exceed configuration limitations.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to store on the next available line in the file.

    • isPrismaInstalled

      boolean isPrismaInstalled()

    • getDatabaseConnection

      Connection getDatabaseConnection()

    • getTeleportingPlayers

      List<UUID> getTeleportingPlayers()

    • getShopMemory

      HashMap<UUID,​UUID> getShopMemory()
